[spoiler]Use: Rufus or other progz, or make manualy bootable USB:

How prepare bootable USB to install Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10:

WARNING! You do this at your own risk! Further steps delete the contents of the USB drive!
Make a copy of the earlier if you need to!

console => cmd [enter]
diskpart [enter...]

list disk
select disk [select your disk USB - carefully!]
clean
create partition primary
select partition 1
active
format fs=fat32 quick
assign

exit
exit

copy whole DVD/.ISO on USB
install system[/spoiler]


In EXTRAS folder:
- HashCheck
- SmartVersion
